title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Missing North West patient found in Free State
description: A person who tested positive for Covid-19 in Bloemhof, North West, went missing after the provinceâs health department did not find the patient at his home.
content:
A person who tested positive for Covid-19 in Bloemhof, North West, went missing after the province's health department did not find the patient at his home.
The department tracked him down, however, and he was found on a farm in Welkom, Free State.
